name: Superheavy Samurai Helper
desc: During damage calculation, if your Defense Position monster battles an opponent's monster, and you have no Spell/Traps in your GY (Quick Effect): You can discard this card, then target 1 "Superheavy Samurai" monster you control, except the battling monster; that battling monster you control gains DEF equal to the targeted monster's DEF, during that damage calculation only. When an opponent's monster declares a direct attack: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "Superheavy Samurai" monster in your GY; Special Summon it.
